document.full_text: a suspected suicide bomber wounded several people on tuesday near a security service building in the northern kazakh city of aktobe, interfax news agency reported, citing unidentified law-enforcement sources.
document.title: suicide bomber attacks police in kazakh city
lines_and_colors: a suspected suicide bomber wounded several people on tuesday near a security service building in the northern kazakh city of aktobe, interfax news agency reported, citing unidentified law-enforcement sources.
